name: Cavernous Crawl
description:
Your corporate overlords have you contractually obligated to dig away at this chunk so rich in resources that you'll be down there for an eternity.

How to Play:
Piloting a Digger armed with a mining laser you're tasked with mining ore from the surrounding underground walls, returning them to the Mega Digger you spawn in will grant you cash which you can then spend to upgrade your Digger, endlessly repeat this process as cave ins are prone to closing up old paths or opening up new ones all together.

Controls:
W, A, S, D keys to move
Arrow keys to rotate turret
Space bar to interact and fire mining laser
Left Click to interact with UI

Furthermore:
I've always enjoyed mindlessly digging away in the various mining games, sure an end goal is nice but sometimes it's more enjoyable to just boot up the game and play to kill time and that was my end goal ultimately.
